channel.title: Working With Albums on Amplify / AppSync / React Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Working With Albums on Amplify / AppSync / React Workshop

item.title: Managing Albums
item.description: At this point, we have a web app that authenticates users and a secure GraphQL API endpoint that lets us create and read Album data. It’s time to connect the two together! As we saw above, [AWS Amplify](https://aws.github.io/aws-amplify/) is an open source JavaScript library that makes it very easy to integrate a number of cloud services into your web or React Native apps. We'll start by using its [Connect React component](https://aws-amplify.
